contextId.information: This can be stated in positive form. AT: "God called us to cleanness and holiness" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: God did not call us to uncleanness, but to holiness

contextId.information: This can be stated in positive form. AT: "We want you to understand" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: We do not want you to misunderstand
